meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Ash</kanji> <kanji>color</kanji> tends to be a kind of gray color, wouldn't you say? That makes this word <vocabulary>gray</vocabulary> (or <vocabulary>grey</vocabulary>, depending on where you're from).
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the kun'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
